definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to chase after/to seek/to do one's utmost to seek or procure sth/to recall
wooden club (used to beat clothes in washing)
variant of 一錘定音|一锤定音[yi1 chui2 ding4 yin1]

sentences.english: Heat wok with oil, deep-fry drumsticks until golden, dish up and drain excess oil, set aside.
sentences.chinese: 燒熱油鑊，下雞槌炸至金黃，盛起隔油備用。

sentences.english: Croquet first played in Hawaii at Punahou School in Honolulu.
sentences.chinese: 槌球首次傳入夏威夷火奴魯魯的帕納胡學校。

sentences.english: You can engage in croquet on the south lawn.
sentences.chinese: 你可以參加南邊草坪上的槌球遊戲。

sentences.english: This is why croquet became widespread as a family game.
sentences.chinese: 這就是槌球作爲一種家庭運動廣泛流行的原因。

sentences.english: 'Let's go on with the game, ' the Queen said to Alice;
sentences.chinese: “現在咱們再去玩槌球吧，”王后對愛麗絲說。

sentences.english: The other day I explored why croquet might have been made illegal.
sentences.chinese: 我以前研究過爲什麼槌球遊戲曾經可能是非法的。

sentences.english: These were used in conjunction with wooden mallets.
In the game of croquet uses a wooden hammer to whack wooden balls through little hoops.
sentences.chinese: 在槌球比賽中，參賽者用木槌擊球穿過小門。

sentences.english: A long - handled implement used to strike a ball , as in croquet and polo.
sentences.chinese: 球棍一種用於擊球的長手柄器具，如在槌球和馬球中。

sentences.english: Savage Fury" no longer applies to " Maul" or "Swipe".
sentences.chinese: 野蠻暴怒不再影響熊的槌擊和掃擊。

sentences.english: In addition, can also lead to mallet toes.
sentences.chinese: 此外，也可以導致槌狀腳指。

sentences.english: Its compact grounds contain a tennis court and a croquet lawn .
sentences.chinese: 它緊湊的外場地包括一個網球場和一個槌球草坪。

sentences.english: Symbol of Faith is a guardian hammer skill.
sentences.chinese: 虔信徽記是守護者槌技能。

sentences.english: Alice wants to play croquet. But she can't play.
sentences.chinese: 愛麗絲想玩槌球，可是她不會玩。

sentences.english: While some people are prone to hammertoe, other risks include tight footwear.
sentences.chinese: 一些人容易患上槌狀趾，這也與腳部受到壓迫有關。

sentences.english: In this way, the crack was not under the striking hammer.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，裂縫就不在敲鐘槌的下面。

definition: to swing (one's arms, a heavy object)/to wave (a sword, one's fists)/to fling (money)
with all one's might/with sudden force/violently/to slam
wooden club (used to beat clothes in washing)
Dongdong, cheerleading mascot of 2008 Beijing Olympics
Tongluo or Tunglo township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
mace (weapon)/see 銅錘花臉|铜锤花脸[tong2 chui2 hua1 lian3]
